article.title: Alion Awarded Contract To Assess IT Products Operational Readiness
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The Department of Veterans Affairs has awarded Alion Science and Technology a $4.7 million contract to support information technology (IT) product development and implementation. Under the contract, the company will assist the Veterans Health Administration Office of Health Administration by establishing collaborative checkpoints for early identification and validation of critical business requirements and traceability throughout the software development lifecycle.
